00036 #include <stdio.h>
00037 #include <fcntl.h>
00038 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00039 #include <io.h>
00040 #else
00041 #include <unistd.h>
00042 #endif
00043 
00044 #include "cfs/cfs.h"
00045 
00046 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 int
00048 cfs_open(const char *n, int f)
00049 {
00050   int s = 0;
00051   if(f == CFS_READ) {
00052     return open(n, O_RDONLY);
00053   } else if(f & CFS_WRITE) {
00054     s = O_CREAT;
00055     if(f & CFS_READ) {
00056       s |= O_RDWR;
00057     } else {
00058       s |= O_WRONLY;
00059     }
00060     if(f & CFS_APPEND) {
00061       s |= O_APPEND;
00062     } else {
00063       s |= O_TRUNC;
00064     }
00065     return open(n, s, 0600);
00066   }
00067   return -1;
00068 }
00069 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00070 void
00071 cfs_close(int f)
00072 {
00073   close(f);
00074 }
00075 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00076 int
00077 cfs_read(int f, void *b, unsigned int l)
00078 {
00079   return read(f, b, l);
00080 }
00081 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00082 int
00083 cfs_write(int f, const void *b, unsigned int l)
00084 {
00085   return write(f, b, l);
00086 }
00087 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00088 cfs_offset_t
00089 cfs_seek(int f, cfs_offset_t o, int w)
00090 {
00091   if(w == CFS_SEEK_SET) {
00092     w = SEEK_SET;
00093   } else if(w == CFS_SEEK_CUR) {
00094     w = SEEK_CUR;
00095   } else if(w == CFS_SEEK_END) {
00096     w = SEEK_END;
00097   } else {
00098     return (cfs_offset_t)-1;
00099   }
00100   return lseek(f, o, w);
00101 }
00102 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00103 int
00104 cfs_remove(const char *name)
00105 {
00106   return remove(name);
00107 }
00108 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
